author: sikaffy27
title: Decentralised Dating Application
description: Online dating has become essential to our society but centralized dating apps fail at helping people find suitable romantic partners.
solution: create a blockchain registry & engine which connects profiles sharing high levels of complementary attributes and commonalities.
